channel.title: Comments for page "Face to Face"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Face to Face"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Happy to help! Guide is under a spoiler near the top of the page, if anyone else is looking.

item.title: Oh right, Nana
item.content:encoded: I forgot about White Witch, I had to use Su-chan so I could equip everything and not kill myself using it. Thanks!

item.title: Re: D-Speed?
item.content:encoded:
Did you include village upgrade and the white witch?
Isn't 23 enough, anyway? If difficulty goes up to 10 it is still passable.
With the right setup there really is no reason to use crimson lotus.
Don't be distracted just because it's still in game, forget about it, it's a relic…

item.title: D-Speed?
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I'm looking at the recommended set-up, and the D-Speed would only be 23 unless you're Red-Eye, so only Red-Eyes could pass the Area 100 check. What would a good Crimson Lotus set-up be?
